post:
Good Afternoon!

Sharedspace provides premium, feature rich, DDos Protected hosting ensuring your sites have a super smooth experience. Through the combination of CloudLinux, Litespeed web server and SSD drives we offer unparalleled performance for your website no matter the size! If you are looking for a fast, reliable and caring hosting provider then look no further than Sharedspace!

Special Offers:

As always we are running a special offer for our HostingDiscussion customers! We are offering a 50% recurring discount on all billing cycles. Our annual, semi-annual and triennial cycles already provide 2,4 and 6 months free respective so the discounts to be had are even bigger when prepaying combined with our 50% discount offer! To claim 50% off simply use the code SUMMER50%

Included with our packages as standard:


  • Latest version of CloudLinux
  • Litespeed webserver with LSCache
  • Choice of cPanel or DirectAdmin based hosting
  • Softaculous AutoInstaller
  • JetBackup for cPanel Hosting
  • Built in DirectAdmin backup for DirectAdmin Hosting
  • Websites backed up to secure cloud storage
  • MariaDB Database server for cPanel
  • MYSQL Database server for DirectAdmin
  • LetsEncrypt for cPanel and DirectAdmin
  • Multi PHP Selector
  • 30 Day moneyback guarantee

Available locations: Dallas TX

Our packages https://www.sharedspace.io/shared-hosting.html

Payment methods accepted:

PayPal and Credit/Debit card through Stripe

Frequently asked questions:


  1. How quick will my account be setup?

    Your account will be setup as soon as payment has been received
  2. My order was marked as fraud, what do I do?

    We use FraudLabs automated fraud screening. If your order gets marked by mistake, contact our sales team via the helpdesk and they'll work with you to verify the order manually.
  3. Can I use all my resources?

    Yes, we won't shut off your account for using the resources allocated to it!
  4. I need more disk space or bandwidth, what can I do?

    Simply contact the sales team and they'll quote you for a custom solution!

We look forward to working with you! If you have any questions please do get in touch with us and we'll be happy to assist
